SELECT SUM(o.money) AS money ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(r.place,',',1) AS place FROM `rail_prize` r,rail_prize_opinion o WHERE r.id=o.prize_id and o.rank=4
and date_format(release_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= date_format(release_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' )
GROUP BY r.place

SELECT COUNT(1) as count,a.types as types FROM rail_prize a
WHERE a.creat_time >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= a.creat_time
GROUP BY a.types
